name: @financial-times/o-ft-affiliate-ribbon
description: A ribbon denoting affiliation with the FT. This ribbon should be used in products that are owned by the Financial Times but have a separate brand identity to the company.

scripts.build: npm_config_yes=true npx "origami-build-tools@^11" install && npm_config_yes=true npx "origami-build-tools@^11" demo
